description:
Separated from the group, Michelle and Hizamaru are attacked by Terraformars using the powers of the other Mosaic operation subjects who died.  Overwhelmed and outmatched, their only hope is to use a cunning plan to trick No. 4 division into destroying their foes for them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: STRATEGY AND TACTICS 武器と術
Strategy and Tactics: Buki to Jutsu
Strategy and Tactics: Weapons and Techniques
